attributes.action: Ban Glue Mats for Mice & Rats
attributes.additional_details: It can’t be right that these small animals are stuck on the mat and either die of starvation, dehydration or if biting through their own limbs to escape
attributes.background: Make it against the law to sell and use this barbaric method of controlling rodents

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300839
